sentence.Network_en: Rather, the wave function is time - independent mixture of covalent and ionic functions.
sentence.Network_cn: 的确, 波函数是一个与时间无关的共价函数和离子函数的混合.

sentence.Network_en: In covalent bonding, atoms share electrons.
sentence.Network_cn: 在共价键联中, 原子共有电子.

sentence.Network_en: Crystals may be classified as either ionic or covalent by analogy with molecules.
sentence.Network_cn: 与分子的情况一样,晶体也可以分为离子键型和共价键型.
